translations: n.猎人；好猎手；笨蛋；宁录，创世纪中的有名猎手

phrs.translation: 猎迷, 猎人, 好猎手
安塔尔, 尼姆洛安塔, 尼默安托
尼姆罗德公寓度假酒店, 尼姆罗德公寓度假饭店

sentences.sentence: He writes under the name of Nimrod.
sentences.translation: 他用尼姆罗德这个名字写作。

sentences.sentence: Old Nimrod, here, thinks Harve drank too much; and this from such as Nimrod and me!
sentences.translation: 在座的老英雄认为哈维喝酒过度；这话竟然出自于老英雄与我辈之口！

sentences.sentence: Thus Nimrod ascribed to himself power and authority over his fellow man and ruled them.
sentences.translation: 因此宁录以他的权威凌驾于他的子民之上并统治他们。
